comments.author: mgood7123
comments.body: i wonder if this could be related to pixel-perfect rendering (eg, needing to add 0.5 to the drawing coordinates)

comments.author: mgood7123
comments.body:
hmm apparently this works if i use an SKPictureRecorder and draw it into SKCanvas

i do not know why but it works without needing to add 0.5 to my coordinates

comments.author: artemiusgreat
comments.body:
This may be completely unrelated, but you may take a look at these discussions. 

Different frameworks, like Avalonia and WPF, may use different Skia settings by default. 
https://github.com/AvaloniaUI/Avalonia/discussions/7061 

Web and Open GL are not expected to be as pixel perfect as Canvas. 
https://github.com/d3fc/d3fc/issues/1623
